ext_extension_description.message: Make your computer run smoothly by suspending the tabs you aren't using

ext_cmd_soft_suspend_active_window_descr.message: Suspend all other tabs in active window

ext_cmd_force_suspend_active_window_desc.message: Force suspend all other tabs in active window

ext_cmd_unsuspend_active_window_descript.message: Unsuspend all tabs in active window

ext_cmd_soft_suspend_all_windows_descrip.message: Suspend all tabs in all windows

ext_cmd_force_suspend_all_windows_descri.message: Force suspend all tabs in all windows

ext_cmd_unsuspend_all_windows_descriptio.message: Unsuspend all tabs in all windows

js_context_open_link_in_suspended_tab.message: Open Link in New Suspended Tab

js_context_soft_suspend_other_tabs_in_wi.message: Suspend all other tabs in this window

js_context_force_suspend_other_tabs_in_w.message: Force suspend all other tabs in this window

js_context_unsuspend_all_tabs_in_window.message: Unsuspend all tabs in this window

js_context_soft_suspend_all_tabs.message: Suspend all tabs in all windows

js_context_force_suspend_all_tabs.message: Force suspend all tabs in all windows

js_context_unsuspend_all_tabs.message: Unsuspend all tabs in all windows

html_about_fork_mid.message: available on GitHub, without ADS tracking

html_about_report_issues_prefix.message: If you have feedback or would like to report an issue, you can do so on the

html_about_report_issues_suffix.message: . Please check to see if your idea or issue already exists before creating a new one. Thanks!

html_about_debugging_prefix.message: To enable logging, or to set debugging flags, go to the

html_broken_line3.message: You can recover lost tabs from the

html_notice_important_notice.message: Important notice from The Marvellous Suspender

html_options_suspend_no_forms.message: Never suspend tabs that contain unsaved form inputs

html_options_suspend_no_audio.message: Never suspend tabs that are playing audio

html_options_suspend_claim_by_default.message: Claim by default (seamless migration; tab consider suspended if 'suspended.html' is in url)

html_options_suspend_only_on_battery.message: Never suspend tabs when connected to power source

html_options_suspend_no_active_tabs.message: Never suspend active tab in each window

html_options_suspend_automatically_unsus.message: Automatically unsuspend tab when it is viewed

html_options_suspend_discard_after_suspe.message: Apply Chrome's built-in memory-saving when suspending
Reduces a suspended tab's memory usage even more, by utilizing
Chrome's built-in 'tab discarding' functionality. This can result in up
to 500% memory savings when working with large numbers of tabs.
However, it will also cause a slight rendering delay when selecting
For more information on Chrome discarding refer to:

html_options_suspend_screen_capturing_to.message: On a suspended tab, the extension can display an image preview of the what the tab
looked like just before it was suspended.
The screen capturing feature is experimental and can cause significant CPU usage as
well as slightly increased memory usage.
If you notice strange behaviour such as tabs taking a long time to suspend, or chrome
crashing unexpectedly, try turning this feature off.

html_options_suspend_force_screen_captur.message: Enable high quality screen capture mode
When disabled, screen captures have the following limitations to aid in performance:
- Will not capture screen if it takes more than 1 minute to generate image
- Maximum height of screen capture limited to 5000px
Enabling high quality screen capture mode may significantly increase CPU load

html_options_whitelist_title.message: Never suspend tabs with URLs from the following list:

html_options_whitelist_tooltip_line1.message: Add the URL of each page you want to whitelist on a new line. For example:

html_options_whitelist_tooltip_line2.message: To whitelist multiple sites in one line you can specify part of the url instead:

html_options_whitelist_tooltip_line3.message: You can also specify regular expressions by enclosing the text in forward slashes:

html_options_other_enable_context_menu.message: Add The Marvellous Suspender to right-click context menu

html_options_other_enable_context_menu_t.message: Add controls for this extension to the right-click menu of a web page.
This will give you access to advanced suspending actions not available

html_options_other_enable_sync.message: Sync settings with your Chrome profile

html_options_other_enable_sync_tooltip_l.message: Extension settings will be synchronised across all chrome browsers which are
logged in with the same profile.
This will also synchronise settings in incognito mode.

html_options_other_enable_sync_warning.message: Turning this on will overwrite settings on all other browsers logged into the same Chrome profile

html_options_suspend_on_low_memory.message: Instantly suspend when system memory gets very low

html_options_suspend_on_low_memory_toolt.message: This option will override Chrome's automatic tab discarding functionality.
If enabled, it will force a tab to suspend instead of being discarded by Chrome.
Typically, Chrome will only discard tabs once system memory gets very low.
Please note: This may cause tabs to suspend earlier than the time you have
specified in the Automatic tab suspension options.
For more information on Chrome discarding refer to:

html_restoring_detail.message: Please wait while I restore this window...

html_recovery_description_line1.message: Looks like you're recovering from an extension crash.

html_recovery_description_line2.message: Your suspended tabs may have crashed or disappeared.

html_recovery_important_message.message: You currently have screen capturing turned on. If this extension is repeatedly crashing it is recommended you disable this option.

html_shortcuts_context_menu_note.message: Note: These actions are also available via the right-click context menu.

html_success_all_tabs_restored.message: All your tabs have been restored.

html_success_goto_advanced_prefix.message: For advanced session management, visit the

html_suspended_toast_not_connected.message: You are not connected to the internet

html_suspended_toast_reload_disabled.message: Automatic tab reloading is temporarily disabled.

html_permissions_heading.message: Please give me access to local file URLs

html_permissions_info.message:
This extension is not currently permitted to suspend URLs beginning with the word "file".
To change this, please turn on "Allow access to file URLs" from the extension settings page.

html_permissions_backup.message:
Please note: changing this option will cause all your suspended tabs will briefly disappear.
Just in case, now might be a good time to save a backup of your current tab session.

html_update_info.message:
A new version of The Marvellous Suspender is ready to be installed.
Please note: during the update your suspended tabs will briefly disappear.

html_update_info_withbackup.message: Just in case, now might be a good time to save a backup of your current tab session.

html_update_info_nobackup_prefix.message: It is strongly recommended that you export a copy of your current session from

html_updating_message.message: Please wait while I restore your suspended tabs...

html_updated_info_line1.message: An automatic backup was made of your tabs before the update.

html_updated_info_line2_prefix.message: If you encountered any issues during the update, you can recover lost tabs from the

html_updated_release_notes.message: Visit GitHub for full release notes:

html_updated_patch_message.message: Sorry for the disturbance. I just needed to perform a little maintenance.

html_welcome_text_line2.message: I make your computer run smoothly by suspending the tabs you aren't using.

html_welcome_text_line3.message: You can fine-tune the settings below.
